trans-unit.source: Provides a structure for reading information about an exception that occurs in a mobile application.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
This class is internal and used by the adaptive error handling mechanism to encapsulate exception information.
The key to retrieve current exception information from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Context*>.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ErrorFormatterPage> to retrieve information for a <xref:System.Web.Mobile.MobileErrorInfo> object.
To be added.
Returns a description of the exception.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
A description of the exception.
Returns the name of the code file where the exception occurred.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The name of the code file where the exception occurred.
Returns a string value from the internal dictionary or hash table using the given key.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
A string that uniquely identifies an item in the data store.
A string value from the internal dictionary or hash table using the given key.
Returns the line number in the code where the exception occurred, if tracing is enabled.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The line number in the code where the exception occurred.
Returns an alternate text for the exception.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
An alternate text for the exception.
Returns an alternate title for the exception.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
An alternate title for the exception.
Returns the <xref:System.Type> of the exception.
This API is obsolete.
For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The <xref:System.Type> of the exception.
